---
id: cancel-a-job
title: "Cancel a Job"
description: "Cancels an asynchronous job whose status is pending or processing."
sidebar_label: "Cancel a Job"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/api/promotions/promotions-standard-introduction
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel a Job"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/promotions/{promotionID}/jobs/{jobID}/cancel"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancels an asynchronous job whose status is pending or processing.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details

      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"promotionID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The unique identifier of a promotion."}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"jobID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The unique identifier of a job to be canceled."}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>

                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"job_type"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}

                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"name"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"The name of the job. The maximum length allowed is 50 characters.","type":"string"}}
                            >

                              name={"parameters"}
                              required={false}
